summary: Two friends take their dying buddy on one last road trip.
cast: Shawn Phelan|Jackey Vinson|Marty Belafsky|Jason Bateman|C. Thomas Howell|Jonathan Silverman|Kent Bateman|Krista Tesreau|Annie Potts|Eurlyne Epper|Jj Dashnaw|Steven Chambers|Mark Rosenblatt|Frank Wagner|Manuel Pickett|Angelbertha Cobb|Beverly Guard|Frank Welker
title: Rompiendo las reglas
